title: "AI Algorithm May ID Dysfunctional Immune Profiles in Acute Infection"
excerpt: "A machine learning framework, built to deploy a quantitative sepsis response signature, can identify individuals with dysfunctional immune profiles, according to a study published online Nov. 2 in Science Translational Medicine."
